A dove with its wings spread out, holding an olive branch in its beak, symbolizing the message of peace and harmony.
A heart with two arrows piercing through it, representing the idea of opening up and letting go of conflicts.

A rainbow with a circle in the middle, symbolizing the idea of unity and harmony among all people.
